alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Upper Keys in Monroe County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Windley Key, or 18 miles east of East End Of Channel 5 Bridge, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key Largo, Plantation and Islamorada. This includes US 1 between mile markers 88 and 95. This includes US 1 between mile markers 88 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
